reducers.name: add
description: Consider that **trigger.add()** is the same as **pipe.add(-)**

reducers.name: subtract
description: Consider that **trigger.subtract()** is the same as **pipe.subtract(-)**

reducers.name: inc
description: Consider that **trigger.inc()** is the same as **pipe.inc(-)**

reducers.name: dec
description: Consider that **trigger.dec()** is the same as **pipe.dec(-)**

reducers.name: divide
description: Consider that **trigger.divide()** is the same as **pipe.divide(-)**

reducers.name: multiply
description: Consider that **trigger.multiply()** is the same as **pipe.multiply(-)**

reducers.name: max
description: Consider that **trigger.max()** is the same as **pipe.max(-)**

reducers.name: min
description: Consider that **trigger.min()** is the same as **pipe.min(-)**

reducers.name: modulo
description: Consider that **trigger.modulo()** is the same as **pipe.modulo(-)**

reducers.name: negate
description: Consider that **trigger.negate()** is the same as **pipe.negate(-)**
